text: well my abduction story is it starts out
from a beautiful place because my wife
and I my wife at the time and I were on
a camping trip this beam of light came
out of nowhere we were taken up in this
beam of light into their ship the aliens
had a strap down and I tried to signal
to my wife that it's gonna be okay but
you know restrictions like this barely
make this shape it ended up I think she
thought I was doing that but I was
literally doing this but these fingers
were down there so it came off like I
was giving her the bird but I was saying
we're okay we're gonna be okay
and then they started to wheel her away
and the last thing I remember them
saying was don't get weird don't get
weird as you're taking my wife away yeah
I got weird I blacked out but when I
woke up I felt weird
